title: Revenue of KPMG worldwide by region 2010 to 2019
summary: The given chart is of multi-line type with 3 lines namely EMA, Americas, and Asia Pacific. The y axis represents Revenue in billion USD and the x axis represents Year.
Overall EMA, Americas, and Asia Pacific are gradually increasing,  throughout the Year
The lines ordered according to average values of Revenue in billion USD in descending order is: 1. EMA, 2. Americas, and lastly, 3. Asia Pacific.
Overall across the Year, EMA mostly maintained the highest Revenue in billion USD when compared to others with a mean value of 11.81, and it peaked at 2018.
After EMA, Americas overall has the second highest values , with a mean value of 9.0, peaking at 2019.
Asia Pacific mostly had the least Revenue in billion USD with a mean value of 4.16, which peaked at 2019 with a value of 5.14.
